sentences.en: 1 tsp chilli powder
sentences.cn: 一茶匙辣椒粉

sentences.en: Accidental inhalation of the powder can be harmful.
sentences.cn: 意外的粉尘吸入可能有害。

sentences.en: Blend a little milk with the custard powder to form a paste.
sentences.cn: 往蛋奶沙司粉里加入一点儿牛奶，搅成糊糊。

sentences.en: Considerable quantities of CO ₂ are adsorbed even by perfectly dry glass powder.
sentences.cn: 完全干燥玻璃粉吸附大量的二氧化碳.

sentences.en: curry powder
sentences.cn: 咖喱粉

sentences.en: Grind the sugar into a powder .
sentences.cn: 把糖碾成粉末。

sentences.en: gunpowder
sentences.cn: 火药，炸药

sentences.en: He dusted a powder over his roses to kill all the insects.
sentences.cn: 他在玫瑰花上撒了药粉以杀死所有的害虫.

sentences.en: Mind you, don't kiss all my face powder off!
sentences.cn: 当心点, 别把我脸上的香粉都吻掉了.

sentences.en: She brushed the powder out of her hair.
sentences.cn: 她把头发上的粉末刷掉了。

sentences.en: She didn't need any powder or lip rouge to make her pretty.
sentences.cn: 她天生漂亮,不需要任何脂粉唇膏打扮自己.

sentences.en: She is putting on powder, ready to perform on the stage.
sentences.cn: 她在搽粉, 准备登台演出.

sentences.en: Sift the flour and baking powder into a medium-sized mixing bowl.
sentences.cn: 将面粉和发酵粉筛入中等大小的搅拌碗中。

sentences.en: Since the riot, the city has been a powder keg waiting to explode.
sentences.cn: 自那次骚乱以来，这座城市就是一个随时可能爆炸的火药桶。

sentences.en: talcum powder
sentences.cn: 滑石[爽身]粉

sentences.en: The paint is supplied in powder form .
sentences.cn: 这种涂料以粉末状供应。

sentences.en: The paint is supplied in powder form.
sentences.cn: 这种涂料以粉末状供应。

sentences.en: The wood turns to powder in his fingers.
sentences.cn: 木头在他指间会变成粉末。

sentences.en: This machine is made to crush the rock into powder.
sentences.cn: 这台机器是用来把石头压成碎末的.

sentences.en: Unless these questions are solved, the region will remain a powder keg.
sentences.cn: 除非这些问题得到解决，否则该地区会一直是个火药桶。

sentences.en: Using a pestle and mortar, pulverise the bran to a coarse powder.
sentences.cn: 用杵和臼，将麸皮磨成粗粉。

sentences.en: You can add the fluid to the powder, or, conversely, the powder to the fluid.
sentences.cn: 可把液体加入粉末，或者相反，把粉末加入液体。

words.tran_cn: 粉的；粉状的；布满粉状物的
使成粉末（powder的过去分词）；撒粉；搽粉

phrases.tran_cn: 准备万一：准备接受事先没有什么警告的挑战
保持警惕以应付可能的突发事件
珍珠粉；珠光粉（化妆品用）
滑石粉；爽身粉（等于talc powder）

trans.tran_en: a dry substance in the form of very small grains
